alert.note: Alert for Baker; Hamilton; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Suwannee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 1:44PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Baker, northern Columbia, northeastern Suwannee and eastern Hamilton Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 144 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Jasper to near Suwannee Springs to near Live Oak. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and excessive cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Locations impacted include... Live Oak, Jasper, White Springs, Suwannee Springs, Winfield, Suwannee Valley and Belmont. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Hamilton; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Suwannee
